definitions.title: part.
definitions.body: like, as, about (BH [[כְּ]], q.v.);—like, as Da 2:40 [[תַּקִּיפָא כְּפַרְוְלָא]], Da 4:5, Da 4:32, Da 5:1 +; according to Da 4:32 [[וּכְּ מִחְבְּיֵהּ עָכֵד]] and according to his will he doeth, Ezr 6:9, Ezr 6:18 +; about (as BH

definitions.title: 1 a:
definitions.body: cf. Zinj. Lzb:444 [[[ן]]] [[כשלשן מלכ]]), Da 4:16 [[כְּשָׁעָה חֲדָה]], Da 6:1; with inf. (BH

definitions.title: 3 b
definitions.body: ), Da 6:21 [[וּכְ מִקְרְנֵהּ לִגֻבָּא]] and as he drew near, etc. Cpds.:—[[כְּדִי]] and [[כִּדְנָה]], v. [[דִּי]] and [[כַּחֲדָה]]; together, v. [[חַד]] (sub [[אחד]]). p. 453
